text: 2018 was the first seasons in top-tier of Thai football league, Thai League 1 . This season, the club sent the team under the name of PT Prachuap F.C. for sponsorship purposes. On this season, PT Prachaup F.C. participate in 3 official competitions, Thai League T1, Chang FA Cup and Toyota League Cup. ==Kit== Supplier: WARRIX Kit Manufacturer shirt sponsorship: PTG Energy {|border="0" | | | | |} ==Upcoming Match== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=150px|Date / Time !width=200px|Competition !width=220px|Opponents !width=200px|Venue !width=250px|Location |- bgcolor="" | 19:00 (ICT) | | Ubon UMT United |Sam Ao Stadium |Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand |} ==Last match result== ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Out on loan=== ===Foreign players registration=== The number of foreign players is restricted to five per Thai League team (3 foreign players, 1 AFC player and 1 ASEAN player) . A team can use four foreign players on the field in each game, including at least one player from the AFC country. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been registered to the official Thai League T1.
